name: Past Life
summary: Flashes of your life become clearer and more frequent, allowing you to apply skills you developed while alive.
description:
Flashes of your life become clearer and more frequent, allowing you to apply skills you developed while alive. You become trained in a skill of your choice and gain the Additional Lore feat for a Lore subcategory tied to your life.Traits

Skeleton: This undead is made by animating a dead creatureâ€™s skeleton with negative energy.
